statements: SELECT * FROM bug_reports;
SELECT bug_description FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'open';
SELECT bug_id, bug_status, reported_at FROM bug_reports WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT bug_id, reported_by_user_id FROM bug_reports ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'closed' AND reported_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'Open';
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, reported_at FROM bug_reports WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT bug_description, reported_by_user_id FROM bug_reports WHERE resolved = TRUE AND bug_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY reported_at ASC;
SELECT bug_id, reported_by_user_id, reported_at FROM bug_reports WHERE reported_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bugs, bug_status FROM bug_reports GROUP BY bug_status HAVING total_bugs > 1 ORDER BY total_bugs DESC;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_id = 1;
SELECT bug_id, bug_description FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'Open';
SELECT reported_by, reported_date FROM bug_reports ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, submitted_by FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, submitted_by, submitted_date FROM player_feedback ORDER BY submitted_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'Open' ORDER BY reported_date DESC
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, reported_by FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_description LIKE '%critical%'
SELECT bug_id, reported_by FROM bug_reports WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reported_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT feedback_id, submitted_by FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY submitted_date ASC
SELECT feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE submitted_by = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM BugReports;
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, reported_by FROM BugReports WHERE status = 'New';
SELECT reported_by, reported_on FROM BugReports ORDER BY reported_on DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, player_name, feedback, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY submitted_on ASC;
SELECT metric_name, value, recorded_on FROM GameQualityMetrics WHERE value < 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM BugReports WHERE status='New';
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, reported_by FROM BugReports WHERE reported_by='Alice' ORDER BY reported_on DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, player_name, feedback, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY submitted_on ASC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM GameQualityMetrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY recorded_on DESC;
SELECT * FROM BugReports WHERE status='New' OR status='Resolved';
SELECT * FROM bug_reports;
SELECT bug_description, reported_by FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_data WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT bug_id, status, resolution_date FROM bug_status WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM player_data ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT bug_id, bug_description FROM bug_reports WHERE date_reported >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE player_level > 50 ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT br.bug_id, br.bug_description, bs.status FROM bug_reports br INNER JOIN bug_status bs ON br.bug_id = bs.bug_id WHERE bs.status = 'Resolved';

SELECT pd.player_name, pd.player_level, ps.status FROM player_data pd LEFT JOIN bug_status bs ON pd.player_id = bs.bug_id LEFT JOIN bug_reports br ON bs.bug_id = br.bug_id WHERE br.date_reported < '2021-03-01';
SELECT br.bug_id, br.bug_description, count(*) AS total_feedback FROM bug_reports br LEFT JOIN player_feedback pf ON br.bug_id = pf.feedback_id GROUP BY br.bug_id HAVING total_feedback > 5;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports;
SELECT title, status, created_at FROM bug_reports WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT id, feedback, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT game_id, total_players, average_rating FROM game_stats WHERE total_players >= 100 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feature_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' AND submitted_by = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM bug_reports ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, title, description FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY submitted_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_id, total_players, average_rating FROM game_stats WHERE total_bugs_found > 10 ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, description, status FROM feature_requests WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email, display_name FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY join_date ASC LIMIT 5;
